chapters.title: Chapter 17:  Deceptions
chapters.info: Lord Taringail Damodred, p. 277 (244)—Morgase's first husband, and father of Galad, Gawyn, and Elayne. He died years ago. According to Moiraine, he planned to engineer the death of Morgase and make himself the first king of Andor in its history. Taringail was also the husband of the former Daughter-Heir of Andor, Tigraine, who was Galad's mother. In fact, Morgase married him to firm up her support for the throne. See also Trakand, Elayne; Trakand, Gawyn; Trakand, Morgase.
